FuncDef:
The transceiver non-certified-alarm port-down enable command enables the function of setting interfaces with non-Huawei-certified optical modules inserted to Down.
The undo transceiver non-certified-alarm port-down enable command disables the function of setting interfaces with non-Huawei-certified optical modules inserted to Down.
By default, the function of setting interfaces with non-Huawei-certified optical modules inserted to Down is disabled.
Examples: Warning: After this command is run, the port that has a third-party optical module inserted will be forcibly set to Down. This operation may affect services. Continue? [Y/N]:y

Warning: After this command is run, the port that has a third-party optical module inserted will not be forcibly set to Down. Huawei will not be liable for any defects or service interruptions in the use of third-party optical modules. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When other vendors-certified optical module is inserted into a Huawei device interface and the interface is used for connection, to enable the function of setting the interface to Down, run the transceiver non-certified-alarm port-down enable command.
